message: I believe this is a fair split in our current position, Bob.  What do you think?
Alice, my turn!  I think this offer reflects the changing value of the money going forward. Do you agree?
Bob, let's be reasonable.  Your last offer was unacceptable. I'm proposing a compromise that acknowledges the time pressure we're both under. This is my final offer.
Alice, this is my final offer. It reflects the time pressure and the decreasing value of the money. Let's end this now and both get something!
